ygData.subject: Re: [EverQuest] Posting!!!!
ygData.msgSnippet: Kak and Klez can infect via an Active X script...no attachment required. I ve been bitten that way by Kak before, and was getting AX warnings off this guy.
ygData.messageBody:
Kak and Klez can infect via an Active X script...no attachment required. I've been bitten that way by Kak before, and was getting AX warnings off this guy. KIlled it when I reinstalled tho, so all it can do is bitch...not run :-)
----- Original Message -----
From: Nuada Armat'gh
To: EverQuest@yahoogroups.com
Sent: Thursday, May 02, 2002 9:39 AM
Subject: Re: [EverQuest] Posting!!!!

i agree, i saw no attachments and nothing was  picked up, not even by the company firewall or virus software.

>From: Rob LeBeau
>Reply-To: EverQuest@yahoogroups.com
>To: EverQuest@yahoogroups.com
>Subject: Re: [EverQuest] Posting!!!!
>Date: Thu, 2 May 2002 06:34:27 -0700 (PDT)
>
>I was going to comment yesterday that I think you are
>all set.
>
>You must have sent a mail and he somehow thinks you
>might have an attachment with it.
>
>I saw nothing attached, I wouldn't worry about it
>
>Rob
>--- muaddib74447 wrote:
> > Hi,
> >
> > I just want to let you know that I am postting
> > from the group

> > David
